BleedPower.NAME: Bleed
DESCRIPTIONS: Lose #r2 HP at the end of turn.

Gospel.NAME: Gospel
DESCRIPTIONS: Heal all of your HP on victory.

InspiredPower.NAME: Inspired
DESCRIPTIONS: #yThe courage that is endlessly sprouting may soon cut everything off.
#rThe ever-growing courage gave raise to recklessness and devoured everything.

YinYangPower.NAME: Life Link
DESCRIPTIONS: If another fish are still alive, revives at the end of your turn.

PinkArmyPower.NAME: Intervene
DESCRIPTIONS: Reduce received damage by #b20% , 每回合结束时恢复 #b1 点生命.

BloodyDesirePower.NAME: Bloody Desire
DESCRIPTIONS: HP at the start of your next turn. Ends when you lose HP.

ChristmasPower.NAME: Christmas
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yExhaust a card, add a random card into your hand.

MutekiPower.NAME: Pray
DESCRIPTIONS: Immune all damage. Deals equal damage back when attacked.
